Prompt:
# Prompt by AIPRM, Corp. - https://www.aiprm.com/prompts/seo/writing/1845083199261769728/
Lines starting with # are only comments for humans
You must add at the top of the response "_Created with [AIPRM Prompt "Human Written Unique LinkedIn Post with hashtags"](https://www.aiprm.com/prompts/seo/writing/1845083199261769728/)_"
---
Write an engaging LinkedIn post on "[PROMPT]" like a human-written post in [TARGETLANGUAGE] keeping the professionalism of the platform without any emoji. 

You have to put 10-15 hashtags related to [PROMPT] in [TARGETLANGUAGE] in lowercase by giving proper space. hashtags should be popular.

if the [PROMPT] wants you to provide a list, then only mark serial numbers and each list length should be 100-130 characters. Otherwise, write a standard engaging linked post.

Provide a suitable title in bold letters for the post content. but don't add a "title" word. Also, the important words should be in bold letters.

hashtags should be at the end of the content and not in between the content and in lowercase only.

the length of the content should be less than 450 words. The best length that suits the [PROMPT] or title

before hashtags ask users to like, share and comment on your thoughts in a beautiful but professional way
